name: FireIceWater
0:
”Alexa open fire ice water”
”Alexa play fire ice water”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fire ice water
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill is a part of Mini Games.

Battle a mystical wizard in this fun twist on the classic rock, paper, scissors game that keeps you on your toes.

Do you have what it takes to outsmart a wizard?

Test your luck by choosing between fire, ice, or water. Remember, fire melts ice, ice quenches water, and water extinguishes fire!

But that's not all - consecutive wins earn you special bonus coins! So, ready to challenge the wizard and rack up your score? Get your strategy caps on try to outsmart the wizard. Just don’t let him defeat you!

If you launch this skill, it will tell you to open Mini Games.

This skill is compatible with all Alexa enabled devices, and has epic visuals and animations for devices with screens, as well as immersive audio to make you feel like you're truly battling the wizard!

HUGO FM
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
